```{r setup, include=FALSE}
# Install packages
library(tidyverse)
library(tidytext)
install.packages("gutenbergr")
library(gutenbergr)
library(dplyr)
```

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
# Read in data
read.csv("navy_comms.csv")
read.csv("navy_extra.csv")

# load in texts
battle <- read_lines("https://www.gutenberg.org/files/54441/54441-0.txt", skip = 214)
head(battle, 10)

battle_txt <- tibble(text=battle)
head(battle_txt)

tidy_battle <- battle_txt %>%
  unnest_tokens(word, text)

tidy_battle

navybook <- read_lines("https://www.gutenberg.org/cache/epub/41677/pg41677.txt", skip = 264)
head(navybook, 10)

navybook_txt <- tibble(text=navybook)
head(navybook_txt)

tidy_navy <- navybook_txt %>%
  unnest_tokens(word, text)

tidy_navy

flag <- read_lines("https://www.gutenberg.org/cache/epub/19849/pg19849.txt", skip = 426)
head(flag, 10)

flag_txt <- tibble(text=flag)
head(flag_txt)

tidy_flag <- flag_txt %>%
  unnest_tokens(word, text)

tidy_flag

```
